abstracts.cdata!:
The project would involve construction
            at Tocumen International Airport of (a) a new paved runway
            3,350 m by 45 m with parallel taxiway, complete with
            lighting, (b) runway approach lighting, (c) an Instrument
            Landing System (ILS), (d) aircraft parking apron, (e) new
            air passenger terminal building, (f) control tower, (g)
            crash-rescue building, and (h) other related works. Also
            included are consultants' services for design and
            supervision of construction, for strengthening management
            and for the preparation of a National Aviation Plan as a
            guide to the allocation of DAC resources.
